2025-02-04.title: Japan game maker Nintendo reports lower profit as demand for Switch consoles wanes
2025-02-04.description: TOKYO (AP) — Nintendo’s profits tumbled as sales of its Switch console lost momentum, prompting the Japanese video-game maker to lower its full-year forecasts. Kyoto-based Nintendo Co., which created the Super Mario franchise, reported Tuesday an April-Decemb…

2025-01-17.title: Nintendo says its new Switch 2 console will be released in 2025
2025-01-17.description: LOS ANGELES (AP) — Gaming giant Nintendo revealed its newest console Thursday in a highly anticipated announcement gamers had been waiting for since rumors of its release first spread years ago. But the initial reaction to the Nintendo Switch 2 was lackluster…

2025-03-25.title: Neos Kicks Off Global Indie Game Publishing Business
2025-03-25.description: -New Label “IndieTech Games” Launched- TOKYO — Neos has launched “IndieTech Games,” a label dedicated to publishing high-quality indie games worldwide, including in Japan. Neos entered the game development and publishing business for Nintendo Switch in 2019, …
